meanings.definition: Going up a slope or incline.
meanings.sent2: The hikers faced an uphill trek.
meanings.sent3: Trying to dance uphill was quite a sight!
meanings.sent4: Her uphill battle against the illness inspired many.
meanings.sent5: The uphill journey tested their endurance.

meanings.sent1: She struggled uphill to reach the top.
meanings.sent2: The ball rolled uphill before stopping.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to walk uphill on the slide.
meanings.sent4: His spirits lifted uphill as he conquered the challenge.
meanings.sent5: The river flowed uphill in his dream.

meanings.sent1: The project seemed uphill at first.
meanings.sent2: They faced an uphill battle to win the competition.
meanings.sent3: Eating spaghetti with chopsticks was an uphill task for him.
meanings.sent4: Overcoming the fear of heights was an uphill struggle.
meanings.sent5: The uphill road to success is paved with hard work.
